document.full_text: rupert murdoch's news international has asked nine people who claim their phones were hacked by the newspaper group to provide more evidence, after apologizing for the first time to eight others on friday.
document.title: news international asks 9 hacking claimants for more info
lines_and_colors: rupert murdoch's news international has asked nine people who claim their phones were hacked by the newspaper group to provide more evidence, after apologizing for the first time to eight others on friday.
